ygData.subject: Re: Where can I find Greater Heal?!
ygData.msgSnippet: The best palce to go and get Cleric spells are in Qeynos they have all your spells up to lvl 49 and its a small town easy to find the guild. Trust me:) ...
ygData.messageBody:
The best palce to go and get Cleric spells are in Qeynos they have all
your spells up to lvl 49 and its a small town easy to find the guild. Trust
me:)

-----Original Message-----
From: Rose <rliu@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, September 03, 1999 12:20 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Where can I find Greater Heal?!


>From: "Rose" <rliu@...>
>
>
>OK last night I searched the Hall of Truth and the cleric guild in Freeport
>and Can-Not-Find the stupid greater heal spell. I just ran all the way
from
>South Karana and before I ran allll the way back to Qeynos, I just need to
>know if the greater heal spell can be found in Qeynos. Anyone knows?
Also,
>maybe there is a vendor hidden somewhere in the cleric guild and I wasn't
>able to find him/her in Freeport...can the greater heal spell be found in
>Freeport at all? Help.
>
>-Imogen the frustrated
>
